title: My Favorite League Of Legends Champion
body:
Yorick, for having such a good laning phase!
Annie, for having insane potential in teamfights!
Soraka, for being so caring!
Udyr, for always escaping every situation!
Orianna, for having such a complex skillshot!
:)

replies.body:
Shyvana: Because dragon
Nautilus: Because Astronaut
Camille: Because legs
Velkoz: Because Hentai

Brand : because I want to watch the world burn
Rumble : because no toplaners deserve farm
Amumu : because the tears sustain me
Udyr : because I'm a boosted animal
Mordekaiser : because Hue
I see what you did there.

Geez
Everyone here seems to miss... hold on... what was it again? Oh yeah:
The joke!

A few of them spotted it 

Clearly others missed it
Like, how slow can you be?
Usually these are the same people I get in my games
Eh, now I see why league can be a hassle sometimes.

{{champion:21}} Boobs and red hair.
{{champion:89}} Red hair and boobs.
{{champion:25}} Boobs and bondage.
{{champion:254}} Boobs and dunks (something no other woman can do).

I think there's a pattern there, I'm not sure.

Talon: Because  **BLADES** (and also because he's the only champ i'm good at)

Sona: Because the easy way out

Irelia: not her kit, because waifu material

Yasuo: Because why not? Being overloaded is fun.
Darius: Because if the ult didn't kill you, the bleed would.
Zed: Because I like being a ninja.
Ekko: Because I love blowing ppl up with style.
Master Yi: Because I like Cowsep.
Shen: Because I like being a ninja.
Ezreal: Because I like kiting.
Ryze: Because E-Q-W-Q-E-E-W-E-Q-W-Q-E-Q-W.....
Udyr: Because, GATES!

Maokai: Because trees are cool!
Orianna: Because robots!
Ryze: Because I'm Faker!
Diana: Because squishies suck!
Ezreal: Because who needs a map?
Kennen: Because balance is unnecessary!
Azir: Because Shurima is good!
Irelia: Because nerfs suck!
Shen: Because teammates dying sucks!
Evelynn: Because being seen sucks!
Rumble: Because mana sucks!
